title: AI Deploy
description1: Deploy your AI applications and models with high availability.
description2: Choose from a catalog, or deploy your own Docker images.
description3: Are you a data scientist or developer looking to deploy an AI application or model in just a few minutes? Select from a catalog of apps, or import your own containerised app. OVHcloud takes care of its high availability deployment and security. Get CPU or GPU resources, real-time tracking tools, and simple, pay-as-you-go pricing. You can then log in via the API, or via an HTTP web interface.
cardTuto1Content: Find all the documentation for AI Deploy.
cardTuto2Content: Find out what an app is at OVHcloud.
cardTuto3Content: Find out how to start your app quickly via the OVHcloud Control Panel, command line or API.
